product_name: The North Face GTD Capri Tights - Women's
long_description: Perfect for your next training session, the North Face GTD capri tights combine a great fit with light support. VaporWick(R) fabric seriously keeps up with hard-working pores, taking sweat from your skin and moving to the fabric's outer face for quick evaporation. Supportive fabric and back-of-the-knee mesh panels keep hard-working muscles comfortable when it's go time. Silver-salt treatment at gusset fights odors so you don't have to worry about funky tights. Elastic waist with drawstring ensures a comfortable fit. Need to stash some extra fuel for that last mile? A rear zippered pocket holds small items and minimizes their shifting around. The North Face GTD capri tights feature reflective highlights that increase visibility in low light.
short_description: Perfect for your next training session, the North Face GTD capri tights combine a great fit with light support.
